sentence.Network_en: Circumcise therefore the foreskin of your heart, and be no more stiffnecked.
sentence.Network_cn: 所以你们要将心里的污秽除掉, 不可再硬着颈项.

list.abs: 雅思英文阅读：医学方面基本常用词_新东方在线 ... ）stroke 中风 ）stiffneck 落枕 ）cholera 霍乱.
托福考试常见高频场景词汇(免费)_百度文库 ... cholera 霍乱， stiffneck 脖子发僵， yellow fever 黄热病，.

entry.tran: 傲慢而顽固的;倔强的;犟的
entry.def: If you say that someone is stiff-necked, you mean that they are proud and unwilling to do what other people want.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
